text: Pust' soblyudayut tselomudriye te, kotoryye ne nakhodyat vozmozhnosti vstupit' v brak, poka Allakh ne obogatit ikh iz Svoyey milosti. Yesli nevol'niki, kotorymi ovladeli vashi desnitsy, khotyat poluchit' pis'mo o summe vykupa, to dayte im takoye pis'mo, yesli vy nashli v nikh dobryye kachestva, i odarite ikh iz imushchestva Allakha, kotoroye On daroval vam. Ne prinuzhdayte svoikh nevol'nits k bludu radi obreteniya tlennykh blag mirskoy zhizni, yesli oni zhelayut blyusti tselomudriye. Yesli zhe kto-libo prinudit ikh k etomu, to Allakh posle prinuzhdeniya ikh budet Proshchayushchim, Miloserdnym
